page.title: 14Social Concerns
page.content: There is concern that Hungerford will be enlarged with more houses. It is generally felt the town is large enough and more housing development should be kept to a minimum. It is felt that light industry should be attracted to the town thus providing jobs for local people and helping to negate the concern that Hungerford may become a "dormitory" town.To encourage industry to the area, the Trade,Industry and Employ- ment committee was formed, a prom- otional brochure printed and a video film made by 8 children from the local school. Lack of employment is a great concern, since 1984 the closure of 4 main firms Little car parking is available in town.Parking is in 7O space car park with some street parking.It is agreed that more provision should be made.
